remarks: Add two decimal integers ` M ` and ` N ` (no carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numma.1 $e |- T e. NN0 $.
numma.2 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numma.3 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
numma.4 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
numma.5 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
numma.6 $e |- M = ( ( T x. A ) + B ) $.
numma.7 $e |- N = ( ( T x. C ) + D ) $.
numadd.8 $e |- ( A + C ) = E $.
numadd.9 $e |- ( B + D ) = F $.
numadd $p |- ( M + N ) = ( ( T x. E ) + F ) $.
